title: 375. Andy & DJ CTI: Twitter Collecting Data From Users, Teacher Supporting Pedophilia & Scooby-Doo Character Can't Call Police Anymore
itunes:title: 375. Andy & DJ CTI: Twitter Collecting Data From Users, Teacher Supporting Pedophilia & Scooby-Doo Character Can't Call Police Anymore
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss the whistleblower who revealed the information Twitter collects from its users, an El Paso ISD teacher being fired after telling her students pedophiles should be called MAPs, and the white female character from Scooby-Doo not being able to call the police anymore in the MultiVersus video game.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss the whistleblower who revealed the information Twitter collects from its users, an El Paso ISD teacher being fired after telling her students pedophiles should be called MAPs, and the white female character from Scooby-Doo not being able to call the police anymore in the MultiVersus video game.
